meanings.definition: To shout or call out loudly.
meanings.sent1: She was hollering for her lost dog in the park.
meanings.sent2: The children were hollering with joy on the playground.
meanings.sent3: The parrot started hollering back at the noisy kids.
meanings.sent4: The wind hollered through the trees on the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: His hollering voice echoed across the empty street.

meanings.sent1: The hollering from the crowd could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent2: His hollering startled the birds in the quiet forest.
meanings.sent3: The hollering of the baby made everyone smile in the room.
meanings.sent4: The hollering of the sirens filled the night air.
meanings.sent5: The hollering of the fans filled the stadium with excitement.
